metadata.title: CVE-2024-36890 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mm/slab: make __free(kfree) accept error pointers Currently, if anautomatically freed allocation is an error pointer that will lead to acrash. An example of this is in wm831x_gpio_dbg_show(). 171 char *label__free(kfree) = gpiochip_dup_line_label(chip, i); 172 if (IS_ERR(label)) {173 dev_err(wm831x->dev, "Failed to duplicate label\n"); 174 continue; 175} The auto clean up function should check for error pointers as well,otherwise we're going to keep hitting issues like this.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-36890` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-40-generic - 6.8.0-40.40
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-40-generic - 6.8.0-40.40
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-40-generic-64k - 6.8.0-40.40
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1013-aws - 6.8.0-1013.14
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1012-azure - 6.8.0-1012.14
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1012-gcp - 6.8.0-1012.13
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-gke - 6.8.0-1008.11
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1010-ibm - 6.8.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-40-lowlatency - 6.8.0-40.40.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-40-lowlatency-64k - 6.8.0-40.40.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1010-oracle - 6.8.0-1010.10
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1010-oracle-64k - 6.8.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-1009-raspi - 6.8.0-1009.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1010-oem - 6.8.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1009.16
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-2008-raspi-realtime - 6.8.0-2008.8
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.1-1006-realtime - 6.8.1-1006.6
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
